snippet: The fire was the latest in a series of house fires, most started by candles, in power-starved Gaza, and it set off bitter finger-pointing.
abstract: Fire in Gaza building kills two adults and four children twelve hours after Palestinian electricity workers cut off power to building due to nonpayment by one of tenants; fire, latest of series of house fires mainly started by candles in power-starved Gaza, leads to angry finger-pointing, with residents blaming power authority and Hamas blaming Israel for constricting electricity supply.
lead_paragraph: The fire was the latest in a series of house fires, most started by candles, in power-starved Gaza, and it set off bitter finger-pointing.

headline.seo: Deadly House Fire Stirs Anger in Gaza
headline.main: Fire in Gaza Kills Family and Stirs Rage Against the Power Company
headline.print_headline: Fire in Gaza Kills Family and Stirs Rage Against the Power Company
